Owlhawk:  Yes and with this little toy we can assue
all the Preds die a nice, slow, painful death.

His chest opens up and what appears to be a large gun
comes out.  Then it goes back in.

Owlhawk:  So let's see if we can find Talos.

He starts walking around the base.

--- RoboRick007 <rfa007@...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> "So there is finally Vok that dont sit around and
> play god, and actually help. I'm glad to hear that.
> I'm even more glad to hear that they are backing us.
> We'll need their help."
>
